parameters.name: SymId
parameters.description: Name of the geometric tolerance symbol formatted as: < LibraryName-SymbolName > where LibraryName and SymbolName are in the SOLIDWORKS text file C:\ProgramData\SolidWorks\SolidWorks 20 nn \ lang \ english\gtol.sym . NOTE : You must include the right- and left-angle brackets and separate LibraryName and SymbolName with a hyphen; for example, <MOD-DEG>.

title: IEnvironment.GetSymEdgeCounts
description: Gets an array that contains the number of lines, arcs, circles, text strings, and triangles in the specified geometric tolerance symbol.

parameters.name: SymId
parameters.description: Name of the geometric tolerance symbol formatted as: < LibraryName-SymbolName > where LibraryName and SymbolName are in the SOLIDWORKS text file C:\ProgramData\SolidWorks\SolidWorks 20 nn \ lang \ english\gtol.sym . NOTE : You must include the right- and left-angle brackets and separate LibraryName and SymbolName with a hyphen; for example, <MOD-DEG>.

remarks:
Format of return information is the following array of short integers:
retval[0] = line count
retval[1] = arc count
retval[2] = circle count
retval[3] = text count
retval[4] = triangle count
